Install Node.js

Source: R/getNodejs.R
get_nodejs.Rd

Install Node.js

get_nodejs(nodeUrl = "https://nodejs.org/dist",
  buildPath = file.path(system.file(package = "electricShine"),
  "nodejs"), force = FALSE, nodeVersion = "v10.16.0")

Arguments

nodeUrl

path to node.js.org
buildPath

where node.js will be installed to
force

should node.js be installed if it's already present?
nodeVersion

version of node.js (eg "v10.15.1")

Value

list of 2: "nodePath": path to node.exe; "npmPath": path to npm-cli.js

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
